definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition

sentences.english: This is the first solo exhibition of Ding Li upon his return to home from his study at L'ecole des Beaux-Arts in France.
sentences.chinese: 这是丁力自巴黎艺术学院毕业回国后的第一个个展。

sentences.english: Journey to the West, Feng Mengbo Solo, Bund 3 Gallery, Shanghai, China.
sentences.chinese: 《西游记》冯梦波个展，沪申画廊，中国上海。

sentences.english: Lecture: Art in Photography, Taipei Fine Arts Museum, 1989.
sentences.chinese: 人观摄影个展，与友人夫妇，妻，台北市立美术馆。

sentences.english: Xue Song has exhibited widely since his first solo-exhibition in 1999.
sentences.chinese: 薛松的作品在1999年他的个展以后被广泛展出。

sentences.english: He held solo exhibition in Uzbekistan in 1997.
sentences.chinese: 1997年在乌兹别克布哈拉举办个展。

sentences.english: In 1992 Hongkong is held at the spring exhibition of" peony".
sentences.chinese: 1992年赴香港举办个展“迎春牡丹画展”。

sentences.english: One-man show at the Vancouver Art Gallery.
sentences.chinese: 在温哥华艺廊举办个展。

sentences.english: Her solo exhibition was featured at one of the best art gallery in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 她的个展在巴黎一个很著名的画廊举行而显示其特色。

sentences.english: Liang Ching-Fu solo exhibition at 2007 in Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 2007年画家梁庆富在台北举办的个展。

sentences.english: Whether Confucius will have a solo show in the Shanghai museum remains to be seen.
sentences.chinese: 是否在上海科技馆举行一场孔夫子的个展还有待观察。

sentences.english: Dawn Mist, Separation Faith -Yang Fu Dong Solo Show, Zendai Museum, Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 杨福东个展《离信之雾》，证大美术馆，上海。

sentences.english: Her work has been exhibited in solo and group exhibitions internationally.
sentences.chinese: 作品曾在国际上多次举办个展和群展。

sentences.english: To 1977 featured in five one-man shows at the House of Ceramics, Vancouver.
sentences.chinese: 至1977年，在温哥华陶艺之家举办五次个展。

sentences.english: Ni's work has been exhibited in numerous solo and group exhibitions locally and internationally.
sentences.chinese: 倪海峰的作品在国内和国际上多次举办个展和群展。

sentences.english: The work was exhibited in 2008 at Zhou's solo exhibition in Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 作品曾于周春芽2008年台北个展展出。

definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
Ai Weiwei (1957-), Chinese artist active in architecture, photography, film, as well as cultural criticism and political activism
to put on display/to be on show/to exhibit
Cai Guoqiang (1957-), contemporary Chinese artist working with firework displays and light shows
